name: Nightmare
detailed_description:
The floorboards, you hear them squeaking and cracking, the voices are all around you, you are surrounded, and trapped! You are in Nightmare, a classic arcade 3d top-down shooter taking place in your bedroom, in the darkest and scariest hours of the night. Oh, and the voices you hear, they are malignant noises coming from evil clowns and horrid dolls, but that won't stop you, will it? Now go, investigate, all you have is... well... a toy pop gun. And so it begins, the seeking of your own purpose, or, if you fail... ...your own death!

Features:

Endless Waves
Spooky Mobs
and more dying


Can you survive the night? How long can you survive!
